name: Pistole M
description: A East German copy of the Pistolet Makarova.  It uses the 9x18mm cartridge, which remains in active use among various former Soviet countries.

name: Makarov PMM
description: A modernized all steel version of the Pistolet Makarova.  It features a wider frame and hand grip to accommodate double stack style magazines.  It uses the 9x18mm cartridge, which remains in active use among various former Soviet countries.

name: PB Silent Pistol
description: A Soviet era suppressed pistol based on the Pistolet Makarova design.  It uses the 9x18mm cartridge, which remains in active use among various former Soviet countries.
